title: Your Account is in the Process of Transferring
body: Hello, I bought transfer from EUNE to EUW and when i pressed to purchase and transfer my account, lol client needed a restart ant from that moment i can't log in to my account, when i try to log in its saying that my account "Your Account is in the Process of Transferring", so i thought okey maybe i need to wait few hours or something, but now im waiting almost two days and still same. Support doesnt replay to me ticket. Any suggestions? Maybe some gm's respond? Btw i cant even log in to my account at league of legends website it's says wrong region or password...

replies.body: It may be a bit to process the transfer, but if it's been too long putting in a ticket was a good step.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check the status for you, let me know.  If you can't access the ticketing center, you can also email us at support@riotgames.com.
Great, thanks!  I've confirmed your ticket has been received, and is in queue for our specialist to review.  We'll reply back as soon as we can, hang tight!
